resources.string: Join us in revolutionizing waste management and embracing eco-friendly practices. With WasteBucks, you can effortlessly categorize your waste, earn rewards, and contribute to a sustainable future.

Simply categorize your waste, request collection, and our nearby hubs will estimate its quality and quantity, rewarding you with points. Redeem these points for a range of eco-friendly products that we deliver straight to you!
Participate in community challenges, earn badges, and compete on leaderboards. Your eco-friendly actions not only benefit you but contribute to cleaner cities and a healthier planet for all.
Join challenges, climb leaderboards, and inspire others.
Convert your household waste into rewards.
Your gateway to a greener, more rewarding lifestyle
Sweat it out, climb the ranks.
